title: Till Death Us Do Part
description: Every story has a beginning, and an end.This is my conclusion.All of my secrets have been exposed, but my marriage to Jenna still lay in tatters.Heartbroken, and on a path of self-destruction, I will fall, but will Jenna or Chad come to rescue?Will destiny reassert itself, or will forbidden love prevail?Or does fate have a surprise in store for all of us?This is based on real-life events and is the revised edition of the book released in 2017.
author: Zane Michaelson
